properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 16 at 8:59AM CST until January 19 at 6:30PM CST by NWS Jackson MS
properties.description:
...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in
Mississippi...

Tallahala Creek At Laurel affecting Jones County
Chickasawhay River At Enterprise affecting Clarke County
Chickasawhay River At Shubuta affecting Clarke County

The Flood Warning continues for
The Chickasawhay River At Enterprise
* until Sunday evening.
* At  8:00 AM Thursday the stage was 30.3 feet.
* Moderate flooding is occurring and Moderate flooding is forecast.
* Flood stage is 25.0 feet.
* Forecast...The river will continue rising to near 32.0 feet just
after midnight tonight.
* Impact...At 32.0 feet...Flood water crosses River Road, County Road
320 near River Walk Gardens.
* Impact...At 30.0 feet...Water begins to cover several streets and
roads.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive or walk through areas where water covers roadway! The
water may be deeper than it appears. Remember...Turn around, don't
drown!

Please note that forecast crests are based upon rainfall that has
occurred along with forecast rainfall for the next 24 hours. River
forecasts in the Tombigbee River Basin have an additional 48 hours of
rainfall added. Rainfall amounts greater than forecast may take the
rivers higher.


Additional information is available at:
https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN

The next regularly scheduled update is expected tonight between 8 and
10 PM.

NWSheadline: Flood Warning extended until Sunday evening
